pkgmetadata.longdescription: Decomposes a Level Shifted Time Series // Explains the behavior of a time series by decomposing it into its trend, seasonality and residuals. It is built to perform very well in the presence of significant level shifts. It is designed to play well with any breakpoint algorithm and any smoothing algorithm. Currently defaults to 'lowess' for smoothing and 'strucchange' for breakpoint identification. The package is useful in areas such as trend analysis, time series decomposition, breakpoint identification and anomaly detection.
